operations.summary: Get list of the key algorithms supported for key pair generation.

keySizes.description: Possible key sizes for this algorithm, in bits.

defaultKeySize.description: Default key size for this algorithm.

signatureAlgorithms.description: Possible signature algorithms for this key algorithm.

defaultSignatureAlgorithm.description: Default signature algorithm for this key algorithm.

items.description: The actual list of key algorithms.
